description: The tradition of vandalizing Banksy's art quickly after it goes up continues and the street piece he revealed on Saturday, depicting a forlorn-looking priest, has already been modified. The work, dubbed " Concrete Confessional," was situated close to Cooper Union in the East Village, and was updtaed over the weekend to reflect that school's current financial situation.

related.description: Apollo Tyres Ltd. (APTY) rose to its highest in at least 22 years in Mumbai trading after Cooper Tire & Rubber Co. (CTB) dropped a $2.5 billion merger plan, easing investor concern the Indian company would take on too much debt. Shares of Apollo climbed 5.8 percent to 107.20 rupees, the highest close since at least January 1991.
related.title: Apollo Tyres Climbs After Cooper Tire Drops Merger Plan

related.description: Anderson Cooper and Kathy Griffin seem like they are fully prepared to host CNN's New Year's Eve special again this year. However, we know that Griffin has a tendency to make Cooper a bit nervous, and this year she's starting ahead of time.
related.title: Anderson Cooper Tweets Nude Photo Of Kathy Griffin, Says It's Her NYE Outfit

related.description: A cross-border buyout that once valued Cooper Tire & Rubber Co. at $2.5 billion has now devolved into a court battle over as little as a few hundred million dollars. Cooper officially terminated its sale to India's Apollo Tyres Ltd. Monday after months of delay in which Apollo sought to cut the $35-a-share price.
related.title: Cooper Tire terminates $2.2 billion merger agreement with Apollo Tyres. $CTB

title: Cooper Union Students Alter Banksy's "Concrete Confessional"
content:
The tradition of vandalizing Banksy's art quickly after it goes up continues and the street piece he revealed on Saturday, depicting a forlorn-looking priest, has already been modified. The work, dubbed " Concrete Confessional," was situated close to Cooper Union in the East Village, and was updtaed over the weekend to reflect that school's current financial situation.

The protest group Students for a Free Cooper Union explains in a statement.

"Cooper Confessional" depicts Cooper Union's overpaid and visionless President, Jamshed Bharucha, as he confesses his transgression from a historically merit-based full scholarship model, to an expansionist tuition agenda. Hearing Bharucha's lament is Peter Cooper, who founded the Cooper Union in 1859 and established the mission of the institution as necessarily providing free education to all admitted students while educating against the evils of debt.

The priest got a big white beard to make him resemble the prodigously fuzzy Peter Cooper, and the stencil of a confessing Jamshed Bharucha was added next to him. Cooper Union students are taking credit for the Banksy-parodying "Free Cooper: The Musical!" graffiti and the fake Shepard Fairey around the corner as well.

In other Banksy-defacement news, as was bound to happen, someone has wrecked the big "Wikileaks" piece on the Lower East Side, stealing the car's stenciled rear door.

(Top and bottom photos: Justin McWilliams, PAY photo: Students for a Free Cooper Union)
